tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Prachi  has an incredible ability to connect with children, making my son feel comfortable and at ease during each appointment. Whether it’s a routine check-up or addressing specific health concerns, Dr. Prachi always takes the time to listen attentively and provide thorough explanations, ensuring we fully understand the situation and the recommended course of action. Thanks again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr Prachi - A hope as pleasant as rising sun which spreads light and life in this planet, a source of energy. 
She is real angel, which I saw in human form. Her caring, well being, health oriented, approach and attitude towards kids heals the kid faster. 

Specially in my kid, where she was underweight and frequent illness during initial one year after birth, we approached Dr. Prachi. She not only heard us patiently but asked us many questions related to lifestyle and kid's behavior, which helped to find out the root cause as well as cure my kid forever. Now my kid is hale and hearty with stronger immune system. Words are not enough to appreciate your humble caring attitude. Whenever I see my kid smile and playful, I know, Dr Prachi is behind this heavenly feeling which we feel as parents. 

You are the true living epitome of hope, devotion and care. 

Thank you for everything once again.

Went for chicken pox vaccination and general check up..doc adviced to give pneumonia and typoid2 booster which was not mentioned on my chart.she said for blore weather pneumonia is must yest some kid died.but I was still not convinced so only given typhoid 2 booster which was again not mentioned  on the chart.after coming back home I researched on net and found it was not compulsory vaccination previous doc was also from blore he never told me for blore weather its important to give I felt these hospitals simply scaring parents and giving extra vaccinations these extra vaccinations given to only few kids after examination if required not all. have just lost faith in all the doctors now.really don't no whom to trust. Will defiantly not go to this hospital again.no  Narayanan Hrudralaya again.last year same hospital but different  doctor gave multiple test for 3 yrs kid for normal cold saying it might be swing flue..all reports negative .they just take advantage for parents by saying some big big dieses names

Really very bad experience with her, my son got dengue positive and she asked us to do CBC reports every alternate days and asked us to send the report to her. First report she replied but when we sent the next report  she didn't replied so we visited hospital to show report without appointment so first she asked us to pay consultation fee and as it was late so she was in hurry and she didn't see my son ******** but she started asking us to take appointment and was rude to us and told us to come on time. I will not recommended Apollo Cradle as much more consultation fee and not friendly doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
From the time of my son's birth, Dr.Prachi is the peadiatrician whom we have been consulting...every single consultation she gives the accurate fast recovery remedies and motivates us about the parenting. My son is 4yrs 9months now, even he loves her for the warmth in her talks and he believes her and follow her words. No matter what is the issue with my son she has solution and without any hesitation we can share our son's problem. She will guide us right and it will be effective positive impact on my child's health and personality development. We are lucky ones to get treated by Dr.Prachi. She is constantly involved in child's  development in every stage with us.
Thanks a ton dear Dr.Prachi and feels very safe while my child is treated by u.
All the best for your endeavours doctor.
Best Regards,
Hema Ajith

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Have been consulting Dr. Prachi for few years now. Amazing doctor. She thoroughly understands the problem and gives proper advice. Recently we consulted her for our newborn and we were very satisfied with the way in which she attended our baby right from day of birth till the follow up consultation and recovery of baby from Jaundice. She also advised the right way to care for baby. Must recommend. Thank you.

Doctor is very much interactive, listens and understands the problem. She provides proper medication and home tips that can be followed. Can contact on mobile in case of any emergency as well. Overall good experience in consulting this doctor for my kid.

I would not recommend Dr Prachi *** *** ********** ******* ************ *** *** **** ******* My experience with her was not that great. To start with, when my new born was just 2 days old, her bilirubin value was 12 ***** ** ***** *** ********* ***** *** ************ *** ***** my baby was put under the light treatment for 24 hours and it was heart wrenching for me to see my kid suffer and cry in pain. Next we had a follow up visit when my baby was 9 days old. And again her bilirubin value was tested and it came out to be 16. ** ***** ****** ***** ********* ************ ***** ***** *** ********* ***** ** ** **** ******* ** *** ****** ** ***** But Dr Prachi ******* * ***** ********* *** advised us to immediately re-admit her for another session of phototherapy. But we didn't listen to her this time and by God's grace my baby is doing fine with proper feeding and sleep.Also I wouldn't recommend Apollo Cradle for delivery. ****** ****** *********** ******* ** ********* **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Its a blessing to have Dr Prachi as our sons Pedeatrician doctor. Our son was born in NH under her supervision. She knows every child is important and this is because she is also a mom. She is best as she knows that child should be able to get nutrients from food than medicines. Only when it is time for her to give medicines only then she prescribes. A multi talented doctor, gives us right suggetions and also gives us time to speak. We don't see this in other doctors who are busy and  don't give us time. we wish Dr Prachi a success, joy and continue with passion always. Thank you Dr.

Doctor is always in hurry.. she would be talking very fast you have to interrupt and stop her for asking any queries. It's mostly like a one way communication. She doesn't give time to patients to talk. She was assigned to us by craddle post my delivery as my pediatrician. We pay for consultation even when we visit for scheduled vaccination and then she would be in super hurry , will talk non stop and make you stand to just leave. She won't let you sit in her cabin for more than 5 minutes. There is no time to ask all the queries patiently. Even if you make a list and go, you will forget things due to her high speed train behavior. Will be changing the doctor soon.

I visited doctor Prachi for my 3 month's old  vaccination since my regular pediatrician was on emergency leave.. doctor is in hurry and after vaccination my baby got swelling and pain on both the legs and it wa painfull for me to see the baby struggle with the pain and the vaccination swelling dint decrease even after 3 days ..even after applying ice pack..I strongly don't recommend this doctor for the kids

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Prachi is a great doctor! she is very understanding and listens to your concerns. we consulted dr for our baby and intialy we all are worried but she handles the situation really well and every time she visits she clear all our doubts. I highly recommend her for anyone looking for a  specialist 😊.Thank you maam.

I am consulting Dr. Prachi since last 9 months for my kid. She is very good doctor, understands problem, clarify calmly and advise accordingly without scaring .....I will give her 10/10 and will strongly recommend..
I booked appointment for 5:30; but hospital was not considering the appointment. So had to wait more than 1 hour to meet the doctor.
********* *******Overall experiene i good.She is a very friendly doctor.On time appointment.Helpful staff.

review: Very patiently listens and lovingly comforts the child. ******* **** No wonder all her appointment spots are always filled.
***** ** ********* ****** *** listens and suggests what she thinks is the best for the baby. She's polite and patient.
